text: François Chérèque (1 June 1956 - 2 January 2017) was a French trade unionist. He was the leader of the trade union centre French Democratic Confederation of Labour (CFDT, ) from 2002 to 2012. He was born in Nancy, Meurthe-et-Moselle. Chérèque died from leukaemia on 2 January 2017 at the age of 60. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in France Category:Deaths from leukemia Category:People from Nancy Category:French trade unionists
title: François Chérèque
